title: Anbullam Konda Ammavukku Lyrics Album
stanzas:
<div>
<div>
Anbullam Konda Ammavukku Lyrics Album

Anbullam Konda Ammavukku
Magal Ezhuthum Kaditham (2)

yedho naanu irukkuren
uruppadiya padikkuren.(2)

yaarumilla namakku
nee eppadi iruppanu
nenaikkuren.(2)

Anbullam Konda Ammavuku
Magal Ezhuthum Kaditham (2)

pallikoodam serkkanumnu
paathiratha viththeengale.(2)

endha paanayil samaikuenu
ezhuthunga.
amma
endha paanayil samaikuenu
ezhuthunga.

Pusthagam vaanga panam
anuppurenu sonneengale.(2)

paathira thaeicha veetula
innum panam kodukkalaiyaa
amma
paathira thaeicha veetula
innum panam kodukkalaiyaa

pusthagam note-u vangalainu
vaathiyaar thinamum adikkiraar(2)

vaangi kodutha penavum
udanji irava vaangi ezhthuren (2)

Anbullam Konda Ammavuku
Magal Ezhuthum Kaditham (2)

kizhinja sattakaariyinnu
kindalaathan pesuraanga. (2)

yemanasu thaangaama
naan azhuguren
amma
yemanasu thaangaama
naan azhuguren

thottakaaraiyaa veettula
pazhaiya satta tharuvathaa
sonneengale (2)

varumpodhu marakkaama
vaangi vaangamaa
ingae varumpodhu marakkaama
vaangi vaangamaa

viduthi soru puzhuvunu
veedhiyila kotturaanga(2)

naam mattum thambikkum
oottura nenappil
azhuthukitte thinnukiren(2)

Anbullam Konda Ammavuku
Magal Ezhuthum Kaditham (2)

keezhaadam sevuththoram
marandhum pogaathamma(2)

karunaagam veduppulathaan
irukkudhu amma
karunaagam veduppulathaan
irukkudhu

melaanda koora mela
saakka kilichi podungamma

merkaththi mazhai
adichithunnaa irukka
idam nenanjidum (2)

paathiram thaecha
kaiyellaam kaayamunnu
sonnaanga (2)

nenju vethana enakku
nee manja paththum
pottukkamaa Â (5)

eppadikka ungal
anbu magal
kodeeshwari.
